issue.title: [C++] IO: coalescing and caching read ranges
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7995](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7995). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This will be useful in order to improve Parquet reading performance on remote / high-latency filesystems.
